text:
Ceribell | ceribell.com | Mountain View, CA | ONSITE Full time

Ceribell is looking for a full-stack developer (Javascript, Ruby, Postgres).

Ceribell is a medical device start-up that has developed an innovative electroencephalograph (EEG) device that makes the diagnosis of seizures and other neurological disorders drastically more efficient. We are bringing telemedicine to the field of neuro-intensive care by streaming EEG data from the hospital to a cloud server, allowing a neurologist to monitor patients from anywhere. Our technology saves lives, and was recently highlighted in the news for its ability to help detect silent seizures (https://news.stanford.edu/2018/03/20/brain-stethoscope-liste...)

If you want to be part of our web development team, e-mail me at ray@ceribell.com
